message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, how about a 52.5/47.5 split?  Remember, the clock is ticking!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. 58-42 is my new offer.
Alice, let's be real - another round and we both lose more.  51.25/48.75 is my final offer.
